text.0: even as an archer shoots afar his arrow offer the laud to him with meet adornment.
text.1: quell with your voice the wickeds voice o sages singer make indra rest beside the soma.
text.2: draw thy friend to thee like a cow at milking o singer wake up indra as a lover.
text.3: make thou the hero haste to give us riches even as a vessel filled brimful with treasure.
text.4: why maghavan do they call thee bounteous giver quicken me thou i hear art he who quickens.
text.5: Śakra let my intelligence be active and bring us luck that finds great wealth o indra.
text.6: standing in battle for their rights together the people indra in the fray invoke thee.
text.7: him who brings gifts the hero makes his comrade with him who pours no juice he seeks not friendship.
text.8: whoso with plenteous food for him expresses strong somas as much quicklycoming treasure.
text.9: for him he overthrows in early morning his swift wellweaponed foes and slays the tyrant.
text.10: he unto whom we offer praises indra maghavan who hath joined to ours his wishes.
text.11: before him even afar the foe must tremble low before him must bow all human glories.
text.12: with thy fierce bolt o god invoked of many drive to a distance from afar the foeman.
text.13: o indra give us wealth in corn and cattle and make thy singers prayer gain strength and riches.
text.14: indra the swallower of strong libations rich in the boons they bring the potent somas.
text.15: he maghavan will not restrict his bounty he brings much wealth unto the somapresser.
text.16: yea by superior play he wins advantage when he a gambler piles his gains in season.
text.17: celestialnatured he oerwhelms with riches the devotee who keeps not back his treasure.
text.18: o muchinvoked may we subdue all famine and evil want with store of grain and cattle.
text.19: may we allied as first in rank with princes obtain possessions by our own exertion.
text.20: bṛhaspati protect us from the rearward and from above and from below from sinners.
text.21: may indra from the front and from the centre as friend to friends vouchsafe us room and freedom.
